import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Navbar from './Navbar' import BannerCards from './BannerCards' export default class OnlineCourse extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { bannerCards: [ { img: "/images/woman.svg", label: "Learn interactively.", text1: "LIVE online session with our", text2: "expert mentors. See a demo" }, { img: "/images/learn-from-anywhere.svg", label: "Learn from anywhere.", text1: "Convenience and safety for you", text2: "and your child" }, { img: "/images/learn-from-pioneers.svg", label: "Learn Learn from the pioneers.", text1: "We'hv been teaching kids to", text2: "code since 2010. " }, { img: "/images/learn-by-doing.svg", label: "Learn by doing.", text1: "100% project-based curriculum.", text2: "Solve real-world problems" } ], } } render() { return (
